name: Global Wind Energy Council
goal: GWEC represents the interests of the wind power industry globally, with primary focus on international organisations such as the UNFCCC, IPCC, IEA, and work with national associations and countries to help improve market conditions for the industry in new and emerging markets.
euInitiatives:
- Europe Aid programmes to support renewable energy development
- LIMITS research project http://www.feem-project.net/limits/01_project.html
- various consultations on climate policy
- various consultations on energy policy
